snippet: "If you can shoot sports, you can shoot anything." So says Doug Mills, who will be in a familiar spot on Sunday: on the sidelines of the Super Bowl.
abstract: "If you can shoot sports, you can shoot anything." So says Doug Mills, who will be in a familiar spot on Sunday: on the sidelines of the Super Bowl.
lead_paragraph: This weekend, Doug Mills will be in a familiar spot: on the sidelines of the Super Bowl. As a seasoned sports photographer - first with The Associated Press and now with The Times - he is the envy of the masses who have to watch from their La-Z-Boy recliners.

headline.main: Before the Game, Preparing Is Half the Battle
